Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: fix inaccuracies and add CLAUDE.md

- Add CLAUDE.md for Claude Code guidance
- Fix initial buy amounts \(0.01 -> 0.001 SOL\)
- Correct file paths \(src/services/pumpfun.ts -> src/services/pumpfun/pumpfun.ts\)
- Simplify X API setup to only require bearer token
- Add BSC wallet setup section to README
- Remove non-existent "Auto-Submission" feature references
- Update config.yaml documentation with actual YAML example
- Fix cost calculations \(250 tokens with 0.5 SOL, not 45\)
- Note Flap sell\(\) function is disabled
- Replace defunct FTX with Kraken in exchange list

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
